list.name: FORCE-FIELD
list.description: Meg is protected by a x% shield for x seconds when her Mecha is destroyed.
list.descriptionHtml: Meg is protected by a x% shield for x seconds when her Mecha is destroyed.

list.name: HEAVY-METAL
list.description: Upon expiring, the Mecha suit explodes, dealing x damage to nearby opponents and pushing them away.
list.descriptionHtml: Upon expiring, the Mecha suit explodes, dealing x damage to nearby opponents and pushing them away.
